list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a set of two things used together or regarded as a unit.
an article consisting of two joined or corresponding parts not used separately.
either or both of two members of a legislative assembly on opposite sides who absent themselves from voting by mutual arrangement, leaving the relative position of the parties unaffected.
join or connect to form a pair.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she wore a cardigan paired with a matching skirt
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô mặc một chiếc áo len ghép với một chiếc váy phù hợp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a member of a legislative assembly) another member as a pair, to allow both to absent themselves from a vote without affecting the result.
wirelessly connect (an electronic device) to another via Bluetooth.
